title: Himi 348
lyrics:
6-8’s
1.
Sīsū ko e maama koe
Ki māmani kotoa pē,
Ke ke finangalo ‘ofa,
Mo ke fakamaama’i au,
Pea u ‘ilo hoku hala,
‘Eiki ko e ‘Afiona.
2.
Pea u muimui atu,
‘Eiki, ki ho maama lelei,
Pea u li’aki ma’u ai pē,
‘A e ngaahi ngāue kovi,
Pea u ‘alu ‘alu ma’u pē,
Sīsū, ‘i he maama ‘o’ou.
3.
Pea ‘oua na’a ku hē,
Pea ‘alu ‘i he po’uli,
Ka te u fai ho finangalo,
‘I he ‘aho kotoa pē,
Pea u tali teuteu atu,
Ki ho maama ‘i ‘olunga. *
